TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeCommentStatementCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCommentStatementCollection> class provides a simple collection object that can be used to store a set of <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCommentStatement> objects.
## Examples The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeCommentStatementCollection> class methods. The example creates a new instance of the class and uses the methods to add statements to the collection, return their index, and add or remove attributes at a specific index point.
